name: Sexy Anime Puzzle Game - A Hentai Girl Puzzle Adventure
name_original: Sexy Anime Puzzle Game - A Hentai Girl Puzzle Adventure
description:
Sexy Anime Puzzle Game is a basic block jigsaw puzzle title starring 10 hot hentai girls! Each lovely lady on full beautiful display for you to put together. Build your puzzles, rack up the achievements, and eye up the gorgeous gals before you within this NSFW puzzle game.

Partake in the sexy adventure on offer in this erotic successor to my first title; SPG. Gone are the beautiful landscapes and locations, in come the beautiful women! This hentai title has you construct puzzles while the sounds of love envelop you. All to some wonderful music if you so please. Stunning AI art that was edited by @Kochim will leave you in ecstasy!



Every level includes an achievement for starting, and for finishing them. Get the girls' matching achievements with every level you play! Collect all 22 achievements during your fun.
